title: Ping (ms) problems with only LoL, please help...specs inside
body:
Hey Riot / LoL community,

I play plenty of Overwatch / HotS all day and have never had problems with lag. I've been getting back into league more but the ms has been unplayable.

It usually goes down like...

* Spawn in base 30-50ms
* Walk to lane 70-90ms
* trying to last hit 100-120ms
* anything above and beyond that like team fighting, walking by teammates, etc can get up to 300ms!


***COMPUTER SPECS***

**Processor**: Intel Core i7-6700K

**Motherboard:** Z170X-Gaming 3

**GPU:** EVGA GeForce GTX 980

**RAM:** 16GB DDR4 3000MHz

**SSD:** Samsung 850 EVO 500GB

**Cooling**: Thermalright Macho Rev. A (BW)

As you can see they are MORE than enough to run league and I've even tried turning down graphics / leaving discord. I have Cox for internet provider and I am hardwired in via my router.


***SPEEDTEST RESULTS***

**Ping:** 13ms

**Download :** 16.99 Mbps

**Upload:** 6.51 Mbps

any tips or help would be greatly appreciated, tired of not being able to at least put my best foot forward due to stupid ping problems....thanks!

replies.body:
Rough ride on the Ping train. >.> You'll find that high Ping in League is usually caused by the client not connecting to the Server! It's not a huge issue and can be cleared up pretty quickly by running through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). 

If you feel the client still isn't running up to your standards you could also try putting it into low spec mode! That will take away some of the fancy doo-dads and sparkles, but it should make your game run a bit smoother for you! You can find low spec mode in your general game settings :)
Thanks for the reply! Will check out the guide & low spec mode
